root.name: Constructor Street Wars
root.description: Street Wars: Constructor Underworld. The Gutter Girls humor from Constructor back in this classic strategy game. Build homes, negotiate the rent of tenants, pay taxes in the city hall and use all sorts of dirty tricks to control business operations in your city. Anything goes, from organize raucous parties to disrupt the opponents workers, to even hire ghosts to haunt the tenants whiners.
